data.title: Beasley Media Group
data.meta_description: Beasley Media Group | 18 398 abonnés sur LinkedIn. Beasley Media Group, Inc. is a subsidiary of Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: BBGI), which was founded in 1961 by George G. Beasley.
data.text:
Join us in celebrating the 15th anniversary of the Marconi Award winning 98.5 The Sports Hub! All week the team will be looking back at key moments in Boston sports and station history on all of it's on-air and digital channels.

96.5 JACK FM debuts in Fayetteville, NC playing everything from Pink Floyd and Guns N’ Roses, to Rod Stewart and Heart. https://lnkd.in/g349Hc-x

We're proud to announce that Mary Menna, Mac Edwards, and Ron DeCastro will be taking on expanded roles as Regional Vice Presidents.

Beasley Media Group welcomes back The Mike Missanelli Show to 97.5 The Fanatic starting Monday, August 12th.

97.5 The FANATIC signs Ricky Bottalico, Co-Host of The Best Show Ever, to a multiyear contract extension.

Join all of us at Beasley Media Group in congratulating Philadelphia's Tina Costello & Andre Gardner on their upcoming induction into The Broadcast Pioneers of Philadelphia Hall of Fame. Thank you for all you have done and continue to do to elevate the field of broadcasting.

Our Beasley Boston teams recently hosted Massachusetts Broadcasters Association student scholarships winners, including local Account Manager Paul Sullivan's daughter Ashlyn, a sophomore at Quinnipiac. During their visit, students met with on-air team members including Ramiro of Hot 96.9 and Fred Toucher and Hardy from 98.5 The Sports Hub.
